common.comingSoonTitle: Zai iso nan ba da jimawa ba
common.comingSoonBody: Muna kammala wannan zaɓi. Don Allah ka dawo nan ba da jimawa ba.

dashboard.title: Garkuwar Phishing ta AI
dashboard.subtitle: Ga sabuwar hoton tsaro na wayarka a yanzu haka.

statusCard.title: Kana cikin kariya
statusCard.description: Ganewar barazanar phishing na aiki a hankali a bayan fage.

recentAlerts.title: Gargadi na baya-bayan nan
recentAlerts.subtitle: Sabbin saƙonnin da aka yi zargin phishing da garkuwa ta gano.
recentAlerts.empty: Babu gargadi a yanzu. Ka ci gaba da lura!
recentAlerts.historyAlertTitle: Zai iso nan ba da jimawa ba
recentAlerts.historyAlertBody: Za ka iya ganin duk tarihin gargadi a mataki na gaba.

items.preview: Fansa harajin ka yanzu. Danna haɗin nan…
Gaggawa: Tabbatar da bayanan kuɗin ka kafin a dakatar da kai.
Mun saka kuɗi a asusunka. Don Allah ka tabbatar nan take!

report.title: Ba da rahoton saƙo
report.subtitle: Tura SMS da kake zargi domin mu koyi yadda ake gano su cikin sauri.
report.alertTitle: Zai iso nan ba da jimawa ba
report.alertBody: Za ka iya tura saƙonnin da ake zargi a mataki na gaba.

expoGoNotice.title: Takaitaccen Expo Go
expoGoNotice.body: Binciken bango yana tsaya wa a Expo Go. Gina app na ci gaba ko ƙaƙƙarfan app domin garkuwa ya ci gaba da aiki ko ka rufe app ɗin.

permissionsReminder.title: kunna damar da ake buƙata
permissionsReminder.body: kunna sanarwa da SMS domin garkuwa ta duba saƙonni ta atomatik.

mockDetection.title: Gudanar da gwajin kwaikwayo
mockDetection.subtitle: kunna na’urar gano barazana da saƙonnin kwaikwayo domin ganin yadda gargadi ke bayyana.
mockDetection.helper: Idan an gano barazana, za a nuna cikakkun bayanai a nan kuma za ka samu sanarwa a wayarka.
mockDetection.successBody: Duba sashen sanarwarka domin ganin yadda zai bayyana.
mockDetection.noThreatBody: Saƙonnin kwaikwayo duk sun kasance lafiya. Gwada kuma daga baya!
mockDetection.errorBody: Ba za mu iya gudanar da gwajin yanzu ba. Sake kunna app ɗin ka gwada kuma.
mockDetection.noResultPlaceholder: Gudanar da gwajin kwaikwayo domin ganin yadda gargadi zai bayyana a cikin app ɗin.
mockDetection.noMatches: Ba a gano wani sigar phishing ba amma saƙon yana nuna barazana har yanzu.

onboarding.title: Je zuwa farawa
onboarding.description: Duba darasin farko da bayanin dalilin neman izini.

onboarding.title: Kunshi Garkuwar Phishing ta AI
onboarding.subtitle: Bi waɗannan matakai ka fahimci abin da app ɗin ke yi da kuma dalilin neman izini.

skipDialog.title: Kana son tsallake izinin da ake buƙata?
skipDialog.body: Ba tare da izinin sanarwa da SMS ba, garkuwa ba zai iya lura da zamba ta atomatik ba. Kana iya kunna su daga baya a cikin saituna.

onboarding.permissionNoteBody: Za ka bayar da izinin sanarwa da SMS bayan wannan taƙaitaccen jagora.
onboarding.permissionStepsTitle: Za ka ba da izini ga:

permissions.title: Ka bar garkuwa tana aiki
permissions.subtitle: kunna waɗannan izinonin domin mu binciki saƙonni da zarar sun iso.

notifications.title: Izinin sanarwa
notifications.description: Ba mu izini mu bincika WhatsApp, Messenger, Gmail da sauran ainihi.

sms.title: Izinin SMS
sms.description: Ba mu damar karanta SMS da ke shigowa domin gano saƙonnin da ake zargi nan take.
sms.unavailable: Izinin SMS ba dole ba ne akan wannan na’ura.

permissions.continueHelper: kunna abin da ake buƙata domin cigaba
permissions.incompleteBody: kunna sanarwa da SMS domin garkuwa ta yi aiki ta atomatik.

slides.title: Kasance a gaba da masu zamba
slides.description: Mun duba SMS da sanarwa a kan wayarka domin gano masu zamba nan take.

slides.title: Sirrinka yana da muhimmanci
slides.description: Dukkan bincike yana faruwa ne a kan wayarka. Ba mu tura saƙonni zuwa girgije.

slides.title: Ba mu izini mai kyau
slides.description: Za mu roƙi izinin SMS da sanarwa domin mu ci gaba da lura a bayan fage.

permissions.title: Izinin sanarwa
permissions.description: Domin mu duba WhatsApp, Messenger, Gmail da sauransu nan take.

permissions.title: Izinin karanta SMS
permissions.description: Domin sanin saƙonnin da ake zargi da zarar sun iso.

settings.title: Saituna
settings.subtitle: Sarrafa harshe, sanarwa, da bincike. Wannan allon ɗin wucin gadi ne har sai an ƙara ainihin saituna.

theme.title: Jigon hoto
theme.description: Zaɓi yadda app ɗin zai bayyana.

language.title: Harshe
language.description: Zaɓi daga Turanci, Faransanci, Swahili, Yarbanci, Ibo, Hausa, Pidgin, Larabci, da Amharic.

notifications.title: Sanarwa
notifications.description: Saita sauti, rawar jiki, da lokutan hutu.

diagnostics.title: Bincike
diagnostics.description: Tura bayanai marasa suna domin tallafa wa inganta gano barazana.
